title: Add gum dependency check
description: Check if gum is installed, prompt user to install if missing. Gum provides pretty CLI prompts for interactive setup.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add _ralph_check_gum() function that checks if gum is installed
If gum missing, show: 'For interactive setup, install gum: brew install gum'
Function returns 0 if gum available, 1 if not
Add RALPH_HAS_GUM variable set on source
